subject: Rowing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mr. Parker was an omnipresent figure in rowing at the collegiate and national levels for decades, coaching Harvard rowers with unrivaled success and men’s and women’s Olympic medal-winning crews.
snippet: Mr. Parker was an omnipresent figure in rowing at the collegiate and national levels for decades, coaching Harvard rowers with unrivaled success and men’s and women’s Olympic medal-winning crews.
